name: Electric Eric (Game Jam 2022 Edition)
description:
Our entry to the University of Portsmouth 2022 GameJam! 

This is the Game Jam version of Electric Eric. Developed during the University of Portsmouth game jam 2022 by the Staff Team. 

This is the version we were able to complete within the time limit, we hope to release a 'Definitive' edition at some point, which captures the full game we hoped to implement.
